Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2011...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/9/2014, off Mitch Talbot (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/4/2014, off Jordan Zimmerman (NYN)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 2015...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Texas on 5/14/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/6/2018, hitting .522 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Released by Baltimore on 5/23/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 6/16/2020 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 4/1/2021 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/2/2022 to a minor league deal...
